projects.title: Bridging Bonds with Sabor de Barrio: A CSR Success Story
projects.shortDescription: Sopaipillas pasadas, made with Chancaca Deliciosa, are an icon of Chile's culinary tradition. Our main objective is to strengthen this bond between the brand and people, generating impact and recall.
projects.content: We present a campaign with local taste, with 'SABOR DE BARRIO'! 'Sopaipillas pasadas' made with Chancaca Deliciosa, are an icon of Chile's culinary tradition...

projects.title: Krispy Kreme's Sweet Launch: Winning Hearts in Chile
projects.shortDescription: Discover how we celebrated Krispy Kreme's arrival in the country and captured the hearts of thousands with its incomparable sweetness.
projects.content: Launching Krispy Kreme in Chile required a comprehensive strategy...

projects.title: Our urban beat for world sustainability
projects.shortDescription: Innovative music-driven campaign promoting sustainable packaging solutions and environmental awareness.
projects.content: Our campaign focused on promoting sustainable practices through engaging music and community involvement...

projects.title: Travel from POS to the UEFA Champions League final
projects.shortDescription: Strategic point-of-sale activation campaign connecting local consumers with global sports entertainment.
projects.content: Heineken's campaign aimed to enhance consumer engagement through strategic activations at key events...
